biotools.summary: This preprocessing tool is design for 2D digital mammograms in DICOM  format. It standardizes and harmonizes images through a configurable pipeline that includes spatial reorientation, pseudo-3D stacking, isotropic resampling, intensity normalization, optional denoising, contrast enhancement, and mask processing (if available).

bioschemas.name: 2D Digital Mammography Harmonization (EUCAIM-SW-046_T-01-03-008)
bioschemas.summary: This preprocessing tool is design for 2D digital mammograms in DICOM  format. It standardizes and harmonizes images through a configurable pipeline that includes spatial reorientation, pseudo-3D stacking, isotropic resampling, intensity normalization, optional denoising, contrast enhancement, and mask processing (if available).
